Also includes revenues from funding agreements with New York City for the operation of the MTA Bus Company and Staten Island Railway and with the Connecticut Department of Transportation for the operation of the New Haven Line of the Metro-North Railroad.

Includes reimbursements from New York City for public school student and senior fares and for the provision of paratransit service. Also includes all other operating revenues from rental income, advertising, and other miscellaneous sources.
